content: स्फुट {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [स्फुट्-क] {@--1@} Burst, rent asunder, broken, split. {@--2@} Opened, expanded, full-blown; स्फुटपरागपरागतपंकजं <ls>Śi. 6. 2</ls>, <ls n="Śi. 6.">5.</ls> {@--3@} Manifested, displayed, made clear. {@--4@} Clear, plain, distinctly visible or manifest; अत्र स्फुटो न कश्चिदलंकारः <ls>K. P. 1</ls>; <ls>Ku. 5. 44</ls>; <ls>Me. 70</ls>; <ls>Ki. 11. 44.</ls> {@--5@} Bursting into view; कदंबयष्टिः स्फुटकोरकेव <ls>U. 3. 42.</ls> {@--6@} White, bright, pure; मुक्ताफलं वा स्फुटविद्रुमस्थं <ls>Ku. 1. 44.</ls> {@--7@} Well-known, famous; स्फुटनृत्यलीलमभवत्सुतनोः <ls>Śi. 9. 79</ls> (= प्रथित). {@--8@} Spread, diffused. {@--9@} Loud. {@--10@} Apparent, true. {@--11@} Corrected. --टा The expanded hood of a snake. --टं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Clearly, evidently, distinctly, certainly, manifestly.
